zh.footer_copyright: © 2025 台灣研達工業有限公司 All Rights Reserved.
zh.home_banner: 潔淨驅動高科技，永續共創新未來
zh.home_brandstory1: 台灣研達自2000年成立以來，深耕半導體、封測、顯示器等高科技產業，並與國際真空泵大廠長期合作，累積紮實的專業與信任。
zh.home_brandstory2: 2022年起，我們成為韓國 Daeshin MC 在台總代理，將無塵室專用的鞋底吸塵機、洗輪機及超纖維魔墊導入台灣市場，已獲 PCB、半導體、LCD 大廠廣泛採用。
zh.home_brandstory3: 同時，自有品牌 Magic-Fusso神氟 ® 創新潤滑解決方案，已協助石化、發電與電子級無塵室客戶大幅降低污染與能耗，持續在節能與環保領域創造效益。
zh.home_brandstory4: 秉持「潔淨驅動高科技，永續共創新未來」的精神，台灣研達將持續提供可靠的產品與解決方案，與產業一同邁向更潔淨、更永續的未來。
zh.home_guiding_content: 以創新與專業，提供最可靠的潔淨與節能方案。
zh.home_vision_content: 成為亞太地區值得信賴的潔淨與節能解決方案夥伴。
zh.home_coremission_content: 協助客戶解決能源與污染挑戰，推動永續未來。
zh.home_privacy_content1: 本網站尊重並保護使用者的隱私權。本網站 不會主動收集、儲存或使用任何個人資料，亦不會使用 Cookie 或其他追蹤技術。
zh.home_privacy_content2: 若未來本網站因服務需要而調整隱私權政策，將即時更新於本頁並公告之。
zh.home_privacy_content3: 若您對本政策有任何疑問，請透過以下方式與我們聯繫：
zh.home_privacy_content4: ▪︎ 公司名稱：台灣研達工業有限公司
zh.home_terms_content1: 歡迎瀏覽本網站。請在使用本網站前，仔細閱讀以下使用條款。 當您進入或使用本網站，即表示您同意遵守本條款。
zh.home_terms_content2: 智慧財產權：本網站所載之所有文字、圖片、標誌、商標及其他內容，除另有註明外，均屬台灣研達股份有限公司或其授權人所有，未經允許，不得擅自使用、修改、轉載或散布。
zh.home_terms_content3: 網站內容：本網站所提供之產品資訊、技術資料及相關內容，僅供一般參考之用。本公司保留隨時修改、更新或刪除內容之權利，恕不另行通知。
zh.home_terms_content4: 責任限制：本公司對於使用者因使用或無法使用本網站所生之任何直接或間接損害，不承擔任何責任。
zh.home_terms_content5: 外部連結：本網站可能提供至第三方網站之連結。該等網站內容由各該第三方負責，本公司不承擔相關責任。
zh.home_terms_content6: 適用法律：本使用條款之解釋與適用，均以中華民國法律為準據法。如有爭議，除法律另有強制規定外，均以臺灣臺北地方法院為第一審管轄法院。
zh.home_terms_content7: 條款修改：本公司保留隨時修改本條款之權利，修改後將即時公告於網站，請使用者定期查閱。
zh.item2_content1: 專為高壓力與高流量應用設計
zh.item2_content2: 耐壓型密封結構，有效保護軸承
zh.item2_content3: 插上電即可運作，無需變頻器
zh.item2_content4: 三相電源，精確高效控制
zh.item3_content1: 獨家高效過濾系統，效率高達99%
zh.item3_content2: 專為無塵室設計，有效過濾0.3µm粉塵
zh.item3_content3: 高承重能力，每片模組墊承重500kg
zh.item3_content5: 計次器可選配，輕鬆追蹤使用頻率
zh.item4_content1: 1分鐘內能清洗一台車，效率極高
zh.item4_content2: 清潔時自動鎖輪，提升安全與便利
zh.item4_content3: 氣壓推動輪子，清洗後自動前進
zh.item4_content4: 污泥自動排放及廢水回收技術
zh.item4_content5: 清潔後瞬間除水，乾爽如新
zh.item5_content1: 自動感應，踩上瞬間啟動
zh.item5_content2: 快速清潔鞋底，僅需10秒（秒數皆可調整）
zh.item5_content3: 毛刷畫圓式清洗，高效帶走髒污
zh.item5_content4: 適合半導體、食品、製藥等高潔淨場所
zh.item5_content5: 耐用設計，耗材更換週期6個月至1年
zh.item6_content1: 只需要三步，輕鬆保持鞋底乾淨
zh.item7_content1: 100%無色、無味、無毒的PFPE潤滑劑，專為高溫、高壓、高負載設備設計
zh.item7_content2: 無矽配方，無轉移污染，不含VOC和氯，與金屬、塑料、橡膠相容
zh.item7_content3: 長效潤滑，耐化學物質2000+種
zh.item7_content4: 耐極壓負載，油膜附著力是碳氫潤滑劑的3〜5倍
zh.item7_content5: 高溫低揮發，無結焦沉澱，減少故障風險
zh.item7_content6: 適用於齒輪、滑軌、螺桿等元件，延長設備的壽命
zh.item8_content1: 比傳統鼓風機省電30%以上
zh.item8_content4: 僅需定期更換濾網，免維護、免保養

en.title_home: Candar - Taiwan Candar Industry Co., Ltd.
en.title_products: Products - Taiwan Candar Industry Co., Ltd.
en.title_news: News - Taiwan Candar Industry Co., Ltd.
en.title_contact: Contact - Taiwan Candar Industry Co., Ltd.
en.footer_copyright: © 2025 Taiwan Candar Industry Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
en.home_banner: Clean energy powers technology. Sustainability shapes the future.
en.home_brandstory1: Since its founding in 2000, Taiwan Candar has focused on the semiconductor, packaging, and display industries, collaborating long-term with international vacuum pump manufacturers and accumulating solid expertise and trust.
en.home_brandstory2: Since 2022, we have become the exclusive distributor of Daeshin MC in Taiwan, introducing cleanroom-specific sole vacuum machines, wheel washers, and ultra-fiber mats to the Taiwanese market, widely adopted by PCB, semiconductor, and LCD manufacturers.
en.home_brandstory3: Additionally, our own brand, Magic-Fusso ®, offers innovative lubrication solutions that have significantly reduced contamination and energy consumption for petrochemical, power generation, and electronic-grade cleanroom clients, continuously creating benefits in energy saving and environmental protection.
en.home_brandstory4: Upholding the spirit of 'Cleanliness Drives High Technology, Sustainability Shapes the Future,' Taiwan CIC will continue to provide reliable products and solutions, advancing together with the industry toward a cleaner and more sustainable future.
en.home_guiding_content: Provide the most reliable clean and energy-saving solutions through innovation and expertise.
en.home_vision_content: To become a trusted partner for clean and energy-efficient solutions across the Asia-Pacific region.
en.home_coremission_content: To help clients address energy and pollution challenges, driving a sustainable future.
en.home_privacy_content1: This website respects and protects the privacy of its users. We do not actively collect, store, or use any personal data, nor do we use cookies or other tracking technologies.
en.home_privacy_content2: If in the future this website needs to adjust its privacy policy due to service requirements, the updated policy will be posted on this page and announced accordingly.
en.home_privacy_content3: If you have any questions regarding this policy, please contact us using the following information:
en.home_privacy_content4: ▪︎ Company Name: Taiwan Candar Industry Co., Ltd.
en.home_terms_content1: Welcome to our website. Please read the following Terms of Use carefully before using the site. By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms.
en.home_terms_content2: Intellectual Property: All text, images, logos, trademarks, and other content on this website, unless otherwise noted, are owned by Taiwan CIC Co., Ltd. or its licensors. Unauthorized use, modification, reproduction, or distribution is prohibited.
en.home_terms_content3: Website Content: The product information, technical data, and related content provided on this website are for general reference only. We reserve the right to modify, update, or delete content at any time without notice.
en.home_terms_content4: Limitation of Liability: We shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from your use or inability to use this website.
en.home_terms_content5: External Links: This website may provide links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content of those sites.
en.home_terms_content6: Governing Law: The interpretation and application of these Terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of China (Taiwan). Unless otherwise required by law, any dispute shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the Taipei District Court as the court of first instance.
en.home_terms_content7: Modification of Terms: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Updated terms will be posted on the website. Users are encouraged to review them regularly.
en.item1_content5: No Oil or Gas, No Pollution
en.item2_content2: ‧Pressure-resistant sealed structure for effective bearing protection.
en.item2_content3: ‧Plug-and-play operation without the need for a frequency inverter.
en.item2_content4: ‧Three-phase power for precise and efficient control.
en.item3_content1: ‧Exclusive high-efficiency filtration system with up to 99% efficiency.
en.item3_content2: ‧Specifically designed for cleanrooms, effectively filters 0.3µm dust particles.
en.item3_content3: ‧High load capacity — each modular mat supports up to 500kg.
en.item3_content4: ‧Can be integrated with air shower systems.
en.item3_content5: ‧Optional counter available for easy usage tracking.
en.item4_content1: ‧Cleans one vehicle within one minute — highly efficient performance.
en.item4_content2: ‧Automatic wheel locking during cleaning for enhanced safety and convenience.
en.item4_content3: ‧Air-powered wheel movement — automatically advances after cleaning.
en.item4_content4: ‧Automatic sludge discharge and wastewater recycling technology.
en.item4_content5: ‧Instant drying after cleaning, leaving wheels fresh and spotless.
en.item5_content1: ‧Automatic sensor activation — starts instantly when stepped on.
en.item5_content2: ‧Quickly cleans shoe soles in just 10 seconds (adjustable duration).
en.item5_content3: ‧Circular brush cleaning efficiently removes dirt and debris.
en.item5_content4: ‧Ideal for semiconductor, food processing, and pharmaceutical cleanroom environments.
en.item5_content5: ‧Durable design with consumable replacement cycle of 6 to 12 months.
en.item6_content1: ‧Keep shoe soles clean in just three easy steps.
en.item6_content3: ‧Durable and long-lasting — lifespan of 3 to 5 years.
en.item6_content4: ‧Easy to clean, saving time and effort.
en.item6_content5: ‧Certified by the U.S. NFSI for slip resistance.
en.item7_content1: ‧100% colorless, odorless, non-toxic PFPE lubricant for high-temp and heavy-load use.
en.item7_content2: ‧Silicone-free, no VOC or chlorine, compatible with metal, plastic, and rubber.
en.item7_content4: ‧3–5× stronger oil film adhesion than hydrocarbon oils.
en.item7_content5: ‧Low volatility, no residue, reduces failure risk.
en.item7_content6: ‧Ideal for gears, screws, chains, and bearings.
en.item8_content2: ‧No friction, low vibration, and quiet operation.
en.contact_content: Thank you for your interest and support in Taiwan Candar. If you have any product-related needs, collaboration proposals, or service inquiries, please feel free to contact us using the information below. We will respond to you as soon as possible.
en.contact_content10: No. 86-9, Xiaoren, Waqian Village, Mailiao Township, Yunlin County
